document.discussion_title: Capital & Regional plc (CAL) Stock Rating Reaffirmed by Peel Hunt
document.topic_text: Tweet Capital & Regional plc (LON:CAL) ‘s stock had its “hold” rating restated by analysts at Peel Hunt in a report issued on Thursday. They presently have a GBX 58 ($0.75) target price on the real estate investment trust’s stock. Peel Hunt’s price target points to a potential downside of 2.52% from the company’s previous close. In related news, insider Whyte,Laura acquired 20,000 shares of the firm’s stock in a transaction dated Wednesday, June 29th. The shares were purchased at an average cost of GBX 52 ($0.67) per share, for a total transaction of £10,400 ($13,391.71). Also, insider Norval ,Louis acquired 500,000 shares of the firm’s stock in a transaction dated Wednesday, June 15th. The stock was bought at an average price of GBX 60 ($0.77) per share, for a total transaction of £300,000 ($386,299.25). Several other analysts have also recently weighed in on CAL. JPMorgan Chase & Co. reissued an “overweight” rating and issued a GBX 80 ($1.03) price target on shares of Capital & Regional plc in a research note on Thursday, May 12th. Numis Securities Ltd reissued a “buy” rating and issued a GBX 78 ($1.00) price target on shares of Capital & Regional plc in a research note on Wednesday, July 13th. Finally, HSBC began coverage on shares of Capital & Regional plc in a research note on Monday, July 18th. They issued a “buy” rating and a GBX 61 ($0.79) price target for the company. One research analyst has rated the stock with a hold rating and four have issued a buy rating to the company. The company has a consensus rating of “Buy” and an average target price of GBX 69.60 ($0.90). Capital & Regional plc ( LON:CAL ) opened at 59.75 on Thursday. Capital & Regional plc has a 12-month low of GBX 43.58 and a 12-month high of GBX 71.50. The stock’s market capitalization is GBX 418.10 million. The firm has a 50-day moving average of GBX 55.66 and a 200 day moving average of GBX 60.49. The business also recently disclosed a dividend, which will be paid on Thursday, October 27th. Stockholders of record on Thursday, September 29th will be issued a GBX 1.62 ($0.02) dividend. The ex-dividend date of this dividend is Thursday, September 29th. This represents a dividend yield of 2.72%. Capital & Regional plc is a United Kingdom-based specialist property real estate investment trust (REIT). The Company’s segments include The Mall, Other UK Shopping Centres, Snozone and Group/Central. The Mall and Other UK Shopping Centres segments include the rental of investment and trading properties. Capital & Regional plc Capital & Regional plc
